reviewText: Only bought this for Blowback which has some great filipino action in it and yes that big gun on the cover gets used in an epic scene.

I only bought this wretched piece of fodder because I needed to spend over $40 to qualify for free shipping. It was less than 2 bucks so it made sense to buy instead of paying for shipping. Anyone have any alternative uses for DVD's? Maybe I can do arts and crafts with the kids or something...
